feed.title: Algonquin Park (Lake of Two Rivers) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Algonquin Park (Lake of Two Rivers)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:02 a.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.3Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Algonquin Park East Gate 8:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
Temperature: -3.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: -4.0°C
Wind: calm km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind becoming east 30 km/h this morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. 60 percent chance of ice pellets or freezing rain overnight. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or freezing rain changing to freezing rain late in the morning then to rain in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late in the afternoon. Ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
